<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Superior Bond](/Feats.aspx?ID=657) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Wizard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=166" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 213 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[arcane bond](/Classes.aspx?ID=12)

</column>

---

When you draw upon your bonded item, you can leave a bit of energy within it for later use. You can use Drain Bonded Item one additional time per day, but only to cast a spell 2 or more levels lower than your highest-level wizard spell slot.
